tasks.label: Sync public from src (portfolio)
args: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\public\styles\pages" -Force; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\public\assets\images" -Force; Copy-Item -Path "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\src\pages\*.html" -Destination "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\public" -Force; Copy-Item -Path "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\src\styles\base.css" -Destination "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\public\styles" -Force; Copy-Item -Path "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\src\styles\pages\*.css" -Destination "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\public\styles\pages" -Force; Copy-Item -Path "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\src\assets\images\*" -Destination "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\public\assets\images" -Force; & "${workspaceFolder}\scripts\rewrite-public.ps1" "${workspaceFolder}\Projects\portfolio\public"
